messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2899
messages.msgSnippet: And - when there really is no part of you that wants to stop him from experiencing it himself, then, paradoxically, you WILL be able to casually say, Oh - was
messages.messageBody:
And - when there really is no part of you that wants to stop him from
experiencing it himself, then, paradoxically, you WILL be able to
casually say, "Oh - was that too much chocolate? Want to start over?"
And it won't feel at all like you're giving him a hard time.

On Sunday, January 19, 2003, at 08:57 PM,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> He did not say anything, so I will probably throw it out. I am sure
> that this
> was much more effective then me constantly telling him he was putting
> too much in...
Pam Sorooshian
The National Home Education Network
~The World is Our Classroom~
www.NHEN.org
